    • onActionSaveModifiedPart

      void onActionSaveModifiedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Saves modified part to the inventory
      LOGICAL ERROR: Since Part is an abstract class, the program needs to save the part as an InHouse instance or OutSourced instance. This is done using conditional statements. If the InHouse condition is met, the program retrieves the machineId and then adds the part to the inventory. The same goes if the condition is met for the OutSourced instance.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • generateAlert

      Parameters:
      field -

    • sendPart

      public void sendPart(int index, Part selectedItem)
      Takes the selected part from the main menu and populates the fields with its existing properties.
      LOGICAL ERROR: The sendPart() method has to be able to differentiate between InHouse instances and OutSourced instances. It does so by using the instanceof operator
      Parameters:
      index -
      selectedItem -
